Supergirl TV Talk 2×07: “The Darkest Place”

23 Nov 2016
Podcasts Supergirl TV Talk

This week on Supergirl TV Talk, it finally happened: #TimWasWrong! Tim’s big prediction may not have come true, but there’s still a ton to talk about this week! Cyborg Superman, Sanvers, Mon-El, Cadmus and so much more.

Also, don’t miss this week’s bonus outtakes episode!
